result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott D Korhonen

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on November 1, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

10:49 AM Defendant Scott D Korhonen in court.  Attorney Daniel W Johns Jr in court for Scott D Korhonen.  Prosecuting attorney Matthew J Tingstad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls cases, cites appearances.  Was set for PLEAS.  Background provided by Atty Johns.  Court explains that public def doesn't appoint on TR/FO cases.  Def indicates he will represent himself on those.  Atty O'Dea on TR cases possibly.  11/1 at 1:15 a.m. for PTC for criminal case.  Then set for trial.  Adj.  10:54 a.m.  klr
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 18, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:52 a.m.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Atty Dan Johns appears for def who does not appear.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  DA provides STC.  Parties request PLEAS date.  10/18 at 10:30 a.m.  Adj.  10:53 a.m.
Status conference on August 22, 2022 at 10:50 am.
Pre-trial conference on June 21, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Pre-trial conference on May 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

10:37 a.m.  Defendant Scott D Korhonen appeared by phone means. Attorney Daniel W Johns in court for Defendant Scott D Korhonen.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.   Court calls case and 22TR555-557.  PTC to be set for May 10 at 1:00.  If not settled, set for trial.  Atty Johns advises def to contact him.  Adj.  10:39 a.m.  klr
Status conference on April 25, 2022 at 10:40 am.
Pre-trial conference on March 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

09:45 AM Defendant Scott D Korhonen in court with attorney Daniel W Johns.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Comp rcvd and reviewed.  Def pleads NG to charges.  PTC to be set for 3/22 at 1:00.  NG to be entered in traffic citations.  To track together.  Bond continues.  Adj.  9:47 a.m.  klr  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on March 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Bond doc mailed to def for signature.   klr
